text: Wale Victor Folarin (born Olubowale Victor Akintimehin; September 21, 1984 in Washington D.C.) is an American rapper better known by his stage name Wale. In 2010, Wale was nominated for Best New Artist from both the Soul Train Awards and BET Awards. He did not win. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Wale has released 7 studio albums: * Attention Deficit (2009) * Ambition (2011) * The Gifted (2013) * The Album About Nothing (2015) * Shine (2017) * Wow... That's Crazy (2019) * Folarin II (2021) ===Mixtapes=== Wale has released 8 mixtapes: * Paint a Picture (2005) * Hate Is the New Love (2006) * 100 Miles & Running (2007) * The Mixtape About Nothing (2008) * Back to the Feature (2009) * More About Nothing (2010) * The Eleven One Eleven Theory (2011) * Folarin (2012) ===Singles=== Wale has had 5 singles: Year Single 2007 "Nike Boots" 2009 "Chillin" (featuring Lady Gaga) 2009 "World Tour" (featuring Jazmine Sullivan) 2009 "Pretty Girls" (featuring Gucci Mane and Backyard Band) 2010 "Let's Chill" (featuring Lloyd) ==References== ==Other websites== * Wale's Official website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian musicians Category:American songwriters Category:Interscope Records artists Category:Rappers from Maryland Category:Musicians from Washington, D.C. Category:21st-century American musicians
title: Wale (rapper)
